Japanese:
//Text $1B09F0
#WRITE(ptr,$18D708)
ＨＰが減少していく状態異常[LINE]
「熱毒」を防止する宝石。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B09F0
#WRITE(ptr,$18D708)
A gem that prevents [Poison], a[LINE]
status ailment that reduces HP.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B09A8
#WRITE(ptr,$18D724)
行動不能になる状態異常[LINE]
「睡眠」を防止する宝石。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B09A8
#WRITE(ptr,$18D724)
A gem that prevents [Sleep],[LINE]
a status ailment that renders[LINE]
you unable to act.[LINE]
[END]

//Text $1B0960
#WRITE(ptr,$18D740)

[END]
English:
//Text $1B0960
#WRITE(ptr,$18D740)

[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B0918
#WRITE(ptr,$18D75C)

[END]
English:
//Text $1B0918
#WRITE(ptr,$18D75C)

[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B08D0
#WRITE(ptr,$18D778)

[END]
English:
//Text $1B08D0
#WRITE(ptr,$18D778)
A gem that prevents [Paralyze],[LINE]

[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B0888
#WRITE(ptr,$18D794)
術技が使用不可になる状態異常[LINE]

[END]
English:
//Text $1B0888
#WRITE(ptr,$18D794)
A gem that prevents [Seal], a[LINE]
status ailment that prevents[LINE]
the use of artes.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B0520
#WRITE(ptr,$18D8C8)
戦闘中、[Square_ani2]＋[Down_blink]で[LINE]

[END]
English:
//Text $1B0520
#WRITE(ptr,$18D8C8)
During battle, press [Square_ani2]＋[Down_blink] to[LINE]

[END]

//Text $1B04D0
#WRITE(ptr,$18D8E4)

[END]
English:
//Text $1B04D0
#WRITE(ptr,$18D8E4)

[END]

[END]

//Text $1B0488
#WRITE(ptr,$18D900)

//Text $1B0438

Japanese:
//Text $1B03E8
#WRITE(ptr,$18D938)
戦闘中、[Square_ani2]＋[Down_blink]で[LINE]
高確率で状態異常を解除する宝石。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B03E8
#WRITE(ptr,$18D938)
During battle, press [Square_ani2]＋[Down_blink] for a high[LINE]
chance to remove status ailments.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B03A8
#WRITE(ptr,$18D954)
戦闘中、[Square_ani2]＋[Down_blink]で[LINE]
ＣＣを１加算する宝石。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B03A8
#WRITE(ptr,$18D954)
During battle, press [Square_ani2]＋[Down_blink][LINE]
to increase CC by 1.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B0360
#WRITE(ptr,$18D970)
戦闘中、[Square_ani2]＋[Down_blink]で[LINE]
短時間完全回避する宝石。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B0360
#WRITE(ptr,$18D970)
During battle, press [Square_ani2]＋[Down_blink] to[LINE]
avoid damage for a short time.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B0318
#WRITE(ptr,$18D98C)
戦闘中、[Square_ani2]＋[Down_blink]で[LINE]
ブラストゲージを加算する宝石。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B0318
#WRITE(ptr,$18D98C)
During battle, press [Square_ani2]＋[Down_blink][LINE]
to fill up the blast gauge.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B02C8
#WRITE(ptr,$18D9A8)
戦闘中、[Square_ani2]＋[Down_blink]で[LINE]
自分以外の味方のＣＣを[LINE]
加算させる宝石。[END]
English:
//Text $1B02C8
#WRITE(ptr,$18D9A8)
During battle, press [Square_ani2]＋[Down_blink] to increase[LINE]
the party's CC except the user's.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B0288
#WRITE(ptr,$18D9C4)
戦闘中、[Square_ani2]＋[Down_blink]で[LINE]
ＨＰを回復する宝石。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B0288
#WRITE(ptr,$18D9C4)
During battle, press[LINE]
 [Square_ani2]＋[Down_blink] to restore HP.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B0238
#WRITE(ptr,$18D9E0)
戦闘中、[Square_ani2]＋[Down_blink]で[LINE]
敵の防御を崩す攻撃判定が[LINE]
発生する宝石。[END]
English:
//Text $1B0238
#WRITE(ptr,$18D9E0)
During battle, press [Square_ani2]＋[Down_blink] near[LINE]
an enemy to break his guard.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B01F0
#WRITE(ptr,$18D9FC)
戦闘中、[Square_ani2]＋[Down_blink]で[LINE]
減少効果を打ち消す宝石。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B01F0
#WRITE(ptr,$18D9FC)
During battle, press [Square_ani2]＋[Down_blink][LINE]
to remove debuffs.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B0128
#WRITE(ptr,$18DA6C)
最小ＣＣと最大ＣＣを１増やす宝石。[LINE]
[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B0128
#WRITE(ptr,$18DA6C)
Increases min and max CC by 1.[LINE]
[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B00C8
#WRITE(ptr,$18DAA4)
ＣＣを平均で固定にする宝石。[LINE]
[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B00C8
#WRITE(ptr,$18DAA4)
Sets the CC to the average[LINE]
of the min and max CC.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B0090
#WRITE(ptr,$18DAC0)
クリティカル時にＣＣを＋１する[LINE]
宝石。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B0090
#WRITE(ptr,$18DAC0)
A gem that gives +1[LINE]
CC on critical hits.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B0058
#WRITE(ptr,$18DADC)
一定時間毎にＨＰが微量回復する[LINE]
宝石。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B0058
#WRITE(ptr,$18DADC)
Restores a small amount[LINE]
of HP over time.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B0020
#WRITE(ptr,$18DAF8)
敵を倒したときにＨＰが回復する[LINE]
宝石。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B0020
#WRITE(ptr,$18DAF8)
Restores HP when you[LINE]
defeat an enemy.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AFFE8
#WRITE(ptr,$18DB14)
敵を倒したときにＣＣを＋２する[LINE]
宝石。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1AFFE8
#WRITE(ptr,$18DB14)
Gain +2 CC when you[LINE]
defeat an enemy.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AFFA0
#WRITE(ptr,$18DB30)
敵を倒したときにブラストゲージが[LINE]
加算される宝石。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1AFFA0
#WRITE(ptr,$18DB30)
Increases the blast gauge[LINE]
when you defeat an enemy.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AFF58
#WRITE(ptr,$18DB4C)
エイミングダッシュ中[LINE]
物理攻撃を防御できる宝石。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1AFF58
#WRITE(ptr,$18DB4C)
Lets you guard physical attacks[LINE]
during a front step.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AFEF8
#WRITE(ptr,$18DB68)
フラッシュガード[LINE]
（敵の攻撃をひきつけてガード）[LINE]
でＣＣが２加算する宝石。[END]
English:
//Text $1AFEF8
#WRITE(ptr,$18DB68)
A gem that adds 2 CC upon a[LINE]
Flash Guard. (Guard just before[LINE]
you receive an attack).[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AFEA0
#WRITE(ptr,$18DB84)
フラッシュガード[LINE]
（敵の攻撃をひきつけてガード）[LINE]
でＨＰが回復する宝石。[END]
English:
//Text $1AFEA0
#WRITE(ptr,$18DB84)
A gem that restores HP upon a[LINE]

Japanese:

[END]

[END]

[END]
